hero.title: Modern Healthcare
hero.description: Streamline your medical practice with our comprehensive SaaS platform. Manage patients, consultations, appointments, and payments all in one place.

features.title: Everything you need to manage your practice
features.description: Our comprehensive platform provides all the tools you need to run a modern medical practice efficiently.

patientManagement.title: Patient Management
patientManagement.description: Comprehensive patient profiles with medical history, prescriptions, and documents. Group families and search by condition.

consultations.title: Smart Consultations
consultations.description: Support for online teleconsultations, onsite clinic visits, and local home visits with complete record keeping.

agenda.title: Medical Agenda
agenda.description: Advanced calendar system for managing appointments, consultations, and personal time off with real-time synchronization.

payments.title: Integrated Payments
payments.description: Seamless payment processing with Stripe integration, automatic invoicing, and comprehensive payment history.

tasks.title: Task Management
tasks.description: Create and assign tasks to yourself or assistants with deadlines, priorities, and completion tracking.

website.title: Booking Website
website.description: Each doctor gets their own branded booking website where patients can schedule, cancel, and reschedule appointments.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that's right for your practice. All plans include core features with no hidden fees.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for individual practitioners starting their practice.

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Ideal for growing practices and small clinics.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large clinics and healthcare organizations.

footer.description: The modern healthcare management platform trusted by doctors worldwide.
